apis-v2-ComponentDescriptor.description: ComponentDescriptor defines a versioned component with a source and dependencies.

component.description: Spec contains the specification of the component.

meta.description: Metadata specifies the schema version of the component.

signatures.description: Signatures contains a list of signatures for the ComponentDescriptor

apis-v2-ComponentReference.description: ComponentReference describes the reference to another component in the registry.

componentName.description: ComponentName describes the remote name of the referenced object

digest.description: Digest is the optional digest of the referenced component.

extraIdentity.description: ExtraIdentity is the identity of an object. An additional label with key "name" ist not allowed

labels.description: Labels defines an optional set of additional labels describing the object.

name.description: Name is the context unique name of the object.

version.description: Version is the semver version of the object.

apis-v2-ComponentSpec.description: ComponentSpec defines a virtual component with a repository context, source and dependencies.

componentReferences.description: ComponentReferences references component dependencies that can be resolved in the current context.

labels.description: Labels defines an optional set of additional labels describing the object.

name.description: Name is the context unique name of the object.

provider.description: Provider defines the provider type of a component. It can be external or internal.

repositoryContexts.description: RepositoryContexts defines the previous repositories of the component

resources.description: Resources defines all resources that are created by the component and by a third party.

sources.description: Sources defines sources that produced the component

version.description: Version is the semver version of the object.

apis-v2-Label.description: Label is a label that can be set on objects.

name.description: Name is the unique name of the label.

value.description: Value is the json/yaml data of the label

apis-v2-Metadata.description: Metadata defines the metadata of the component descriptor.

schemaVersion.description: Version is the schema version of the component descriptor.

apis-v2-Resource.description: Resource describes a resource dependency of a component.

access.description: Access describes the type specific method to access the defined resource.

digest.description: Digest is the optional digest of the referenced resource.

extraIdentity.description: ExtraIdentity is the identity of an object. An additional label with key "name" ist not allowed

labels.description: Labels defines an optional set of additional labels describing the object.

name.description: Name is the context unique name of the object.

relation.description: Relation describes the relation of the resource to the component. Can be a local or external resource

srcRef.description: SourceRef defines a list of source names. These names reference the sources defines in `component.sources`.

type.description: Type describes the type of the object.

version.description: Version is the semver version of the object.

apis-v2-Signature.description: Signature defines a digest and corresponding signature, identifyable by name.

apis-v2-Source.description: Source is the definition of a component's source.

extraIdentity.description: ExtraIdentity is the identity of an object. An additional label with key "name" ist not allowed

labels.description: Labels defines an optional set of additional labels describing the object.

name.description: Name is the context unique name of the object.

type.description: Type describes the type of the object.

version.description: Version is the semver version of the object.

apis-v2-SourceRef.description: SourceRef defines a reference to a source

identitySelector.description: IdentitySelector defines the identity that is used to match a source.

labels.description: Labels defines an optional set of additional labels describing the object.

apis-v2-UnstructuredTypedObject.description: UnstructuredTypedObject describes a generic typed object.

core-v1alpha1-AnyJSON.description: AnyJSON enhances the json.RawMessages with a dedicated openapi definition so that all it is correctly generated

core-v1alpha1-ComponentDescriptorReferen.description: ComponentDescriptorReference is the reference to a component descriptor. given an optional context.

componentName.description: ComponentName defines the unique of the component containing the resource.

repositoryContext.description: RepositoryContext defines the context of the component repository to resolve blueprints.

version.description: Version defines the version of the component.

core-v1alpha1-Duration.description: Duration is a wrapper for time.Duration that implements JSON marshalling and openapi scheme.

core-v1alpha1-TypedObjectReference.description: TypedObjectReference is a reference to a typed kubernetes object.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion is the group and version for the resource being referenced. If APIVersion is not specified, the specified Kind must be in the core API group. For any other third-party types, APIVersion is required.

kind.description: Kind is the type of resource being referenced

name.description: Name is the name of the kubernetes object.

namespace.description: Namespace is the namespace of kubernetes object.

helm-v1alpha1-ArchiveAccess.description: ArchiveAccess defines the access for a helm chart as compressed archive.

raw.description: Raw defines a compressed tarred helm chart as base64 encoded string.

remote.description: Remote defines the remote access for a helm chart as compressed archive.

helm-v1alpha1-Chart.description: Chart defines the helm chart to render and apply.

archive.description: Archive defines a compressed tarred helm chart as base64 encoded string.

fromResource.description: FromResource fetches the chart based on the resource's access method. The resource is defined as part of a component descriptor which is necessary to also handle local artifacts.

helmChartRepo.description: HelmChartRepo defines a reference to a chart in a helm chart repo.

ref.description: Ref defines the reference to a helm chart in a oci repository.

resourceRef.description: ResourceKey defines a key that can be given to a corresponding API in order to fetch the content of the resource defined in the blueprint

helm-v1alpha1-HelmChartRepo.description: HelmChartRepo defines a reference to a chart in a helm chart repo

helm-v1alpha1-HelmDeploymentConfiguratio.description: HelmDeploymentConfiguration defines settings for a helm deployment.

helm-v1alpha1-RemoteArchiveAccess.description: RemoteArchiveAccess defines the remote access for a helm chart as compressed archive.

url.description: URL defines a compressed tarred helm chart that is fetched from a url.

helm-v1alpha1-RemoteChartReference.description: RemoteChartReference defines a reference to a remote Helm chart through a Component-Descriptor

inline.description: InlineDescriptorReference defines an inline component descriptor

ref.description: ComponentDescriptorReference is the reference to a component descriptor

resourceName.description: ResourceName is the name of the Helm chart as defined by a component descriptor.

utils-continuousreconcile-ContinuousReco.description: ContinuousReconcileSpec represents the specification of a continuous reconcile schedule.

cron.description: Cron is a standard crontab specification of the reconciliation schedule. Either Cron or Every has to be specified.

every.description: Every specifies a delay after which the reconcile should happen. Either Cron or Every has to be specified.

utils-managedresource-Export.description: Export describes one export that is read from a resource.

fromObjectRef.description: FromObjectReference describes that the jsonpath points to a object reference where the actual value is read from. This is helpful if for example a deployed resource referenced a secret and that exported value is in that secret.

fromResource.description: FromResource specifies the name of the resource where the value should be read.

jsonPath.description: JSONPath is the jsonpath to look for a value. The JSONPath root is the referenced resource

key.description: Key is the key that the value from JSONPath is exported to.

utils-managedresource-Exports.description: Exports describes one export that is read from a resource.

utils-managedresource-FromObjectReferenc.description: FromObjectReference describes that the jsonpath points to a object reference where the actual value is read from. This is helpful if for example a deployed resource referenced a secret and that exported value is in that secret.

apiVersion.description: APIVersion is the group and version for the resource being referenced. If APIVersion is not specified, the specified Kind must be in the core API group. For any other third-party types, APIVersion is required.

jsonPath.description: JSONPath is the jsonpath to look for a value. The JSONPath root is the referenced resource

kind.description: Kind is the type of resource being referenced

utils-readinesschecks-CustomReadinessChe.description: CustomReadinessCheckConfiguration contains the configuration for a custom readiness check

labelSelector.description: Labels are the labels used to identify multiple resources that can be identified by a unique set of labels

name.description: Name is the name of the ReadinessCheck

requirements.description: Requirements is the actual readiness check which compares an object's property to a value

resourceSelector.description: Resource is the resource for which the readiness check should be applied, used for single resources that can be identified by namespace and name

utils-readinesschecks-LabelSelectorSpec.description: LabelSelectorSpec contains paramters used to select objects by their labels

apiVersion.description: APIVersion is the API version of the object to be selected by labels

kind.description: Kind is the Kind of the object to be selected by labels

matchLabels.description: Labels are the labels used to identify multiple resources of the given kind

utils-readinesschecks-ReadinessCheckConf.description: ReadinessCheckConfiguration contains the configuration for readiness checks.

custom.description: CustomReadinessChecks is a set of custom readiness check configurations

disableDefault.description: DisableDefault allows to disable the default readiness checks.

utils-readinesschecks-RequirementSpec.description: RequirementSpec contains the requirements an object must meet to pass the custom readiness check

jsonPath.description: JsonPath is the path of the field of the Kubernetes object to be checked (without braces)

operator.description: Operator is the operator that should be used for the check can be any of these Kubernetes selection operators: DoesNotExist, Exists, Equals, DoubleEquals, NotEquals, In, NotIn

values.description: In huge majority of cases we have at most one value here. It is generally faster to operate on a single-element slice than on a single-element map, so we have a slice here.

description: ProviderConfiguration is the helm deployer configuration that is expected in a DeployItem

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

chart.description: Chart defines helm chart to be templated and applied.

continuousReconcile.description: ContinuousReconcile contains the schedule for continuous reconciliation.

createNamespace.description: CreateNamespace configures the deployer to create the release namespace if not present. The behavior is similar to the "helm install --create-namespace"

deletionGroups.description: DeletionGroups defines the order in which objects are deleted. Only relevant if HelmDeployment is false.

deletionGroupsDuringUpdate.description: DeletionGroupsDuringUpdate defines the order in which objects are deleted during an update.

exports.description: Exports describe the exports from the templated manifests that should be exported by the helm deployer.

exportsFromManifests.description: ExportsFromManifests describe the exports from the templated manifests that should be exported by the helm deployer. DEPRECATED

helmDeployment.description: HelmDeployment indicates that helm is used as complete deployment mechanism and not only helm templating. Default is true.

helmDeploymentConfig.description: HelmDeploymentConfig contains settings for helm operations. Only relevant if HelmDeployment is true.

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

kubeconfig.description: Kubeconfig is the base64 encoded kubeconfig file. By default the configured target is used to deploy the resources

name.description: Name is the release name of the chart

namespace.description: Namespace is the release namespace of the chart

updateStrategy.description: UpdateStrategy defines the strategy how the manifests are updated in the cluster. Defaults to "update".

values.description: Values are the values that are used for templating.

title: helm-v1alpha1-ProviderConfiguration
